Hydras/Perceptor:

Alarms ran inside predacon's base, Hydras still was watting to heard 
more suggenstion for his plan.

"Situation?" said cooly Hydras.

"Unkown sustance is around Maximal base"replied the computer.

"Analize it"commanded Hydras.

After few seconds the computer said"Substance analized..."after that 
said a large list of chemical subtances "just exist a match in data 
banks: the rust plague..."

Hydras Frowned 

"Yesss, after a long time... it's back " hissed the male "Perceptor, 
do you still keep that subtance that save us... that time???"

"Yes master, but I need time to do enough to all.."

"What're you expecting????? GO NOW AND START TO WORK!!!"roared the 
male. And looinkg to other preds "WE SHOULD SEAL ALL THE BASE AND 
THE SHIELDS HAVE TO BE UP IF YOU LIKE SURVIVE!!! ANYONE... DO YOU 
LISTEN ME??? ANYONE CAN LEAVE OR COME IN THE BASE!!! MOVE NOW!!!! WE 
MIGHT HAVE FEW TIME..."

After that Hydras send an encoded message to Maxima.

"Maxima,
If you're inside Maximal's base you have to wait a while before do 
your mission. If you're now out or around, move quickly far of it. A 
cloud is around the base but it's the Plague. Be careful. As soon as 
you're far of Maximal Base's area  go to this area (gives a 
coordinates) and call me when you arrive there. Good luck.

Hydras"
